pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interactive 'tourr' Using 'python' // Extends the functionality of the 'tourr' package by an interactive graphical user interface. The interactivity allows users to effortlessly refine their 'tourr' results by manual intervention, which allows for integration of expert knowledge and aids the interpretation of results. For more information on 'tourr' see Wickham et. al (2011) doi:10.18637/jss.v040.i02 or https://github.com/ggobi/tourr.
